about_the_game:
We combined the strategy genre with a card game to present you our best deckbuilder. You have to build a unique deck, fight for territories, combine cards for greater efficiency and find your way to victory!

The basis of everything is your deck of cards.

Choose cards wisely! During the battle you will come across a variety of cards from which you will build your deck. Choose a strategy, combine card abilities and deal maximum damage to your opponent.

Factions

There are four factions in the game: corporations, gangs, nomads and netrunners. Each faction has its own characteristics and abilities. Cards from one faction strengthen each other, but cards from other factions supplement their weak spots.

Leaders

Each game you will choose the leader of the faction for which you will play. Every leader has his own abilities and talents. One strategy or another is good for each of them. Choose who you will be, how you will play and win.

Cyberpsychosis

Cyberpsychosis will add you destructive power, but it will come at a cost. Are you ready for such consequences? What are your opponents willing to do to win?

Strategy is above all else

A good strategist knows that it is important to have not only strong cards but also a clean deck. Collect the best of the best and get rid of the weak ones. This city does not tolerate weaklings.

name: CyberNet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: We combined the strategy genre with a card game to present you our best deckbuilder. You have to build a unique deck, fight for territories, combine cards for greater efficiency and find your way to victory!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Japanese
